name: Midsummer Night (itch)
description:
Midsummer Night

Top down minimalistic hack'n slash game created with Construct 2 for Game Development with Graphical Editor course as final project in winter 2016.

Features
  • retro graphics
  • positional audio
  • nasty enemies
  • collectible weapon
How to play
  • move with arrow keys
  • attack with space (after finding a weapon)
